command.name: CREATE
READ
UPDATE
DELETE

example.content:
access-list NETCELO-NONAT line 1 extended permit ip 10.101.40.0 255.255.255.0 192.32.1.0 255.255.255.128 access-list FROM-inside line 5 extended permit tcp any any eq www log informational interval 300 access-list FROM-inside line 14 extended deny ip any any log informational interval 300
# ALL ACL FORMAT - 9 cases supported # SOURCE | DESTINATION
ANY | ANY ANY | HOST D-IP ANY | DIP D-MASK
S-IP S-MASK | ANY S-IP S-MASK | HOST D-IP S-IP S-MASK | D-IP D-MASK
HOST HOST-IP | ANY HOST HOST-IP | HOST D-IP HOST HOST-IP | D-IP D-MASK
